class_notes:
FREN 313 French and Francophone Culture
E. Bulakites / TTh 2:30-3:45pm in person
Content:  Every semester. Various aspects of contemporary French and Francophone culture and society are studied through newspapers, film, and cultural documents. We will analyze topics such as race, gender, class, sexuality, nationality, and language, among others. Discussions will be encouraged, and written skills perfected through essays.
course_description: Every semester. Various aspects of contemporary French culture and society are studied through newspapers, film, and cultural documents. Discussions will be encouraged, and written skills perfected through short topical papers.
prerequisites: FREN 310 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
